product_name: Mountain Hardwear Power Stretch Gloves - Men's
long_description: These Mountain Hardwear Power Stretch(R) gloves fit snugly on your hands, offering great dexterity and warmth. Polartec(R) Power Stretch provides 4-way stretch, making it ideal for skiing, cold-weather cycling and other active sports. Constructed with soft, breathable, moisture-wicking velour inner face for next-to-skin comfort. Smooth-knit outer face slips easily into shell gloves (not included) for layering options. Gloves resist abrasion, dry quickly and shed snow and light rain.
short_description: These Mountain Hardwear Power Stretch(R) gloves fit snugly on your hands, offering great dexterity and warmth.
